title: Mesaviva
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, International, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Serves vegetarian meal of the day, which at times, may be vegan or could be made vegan; please inquire. Many tables inside, with a couple more on the front patio. Very attractive restaurant located in the nicest neighborhood in Pereira (Los Alpes) which is filled with boutiques, restaurants and other small shops.
